## CredentialsApi.startAuthentication() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Starts an authentication session.

**Signature:**

```typescript
startAuthentication(userId: string): Promise<AuthenticationSession>;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[AuthenticationSession](./passquito-client-js.authenticationsession.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

You have to call this function even if you are conducting authentication with a discoverable credential.
